plot outline: 'Mohishashur Mordini' is the most popular program on Indian Radio. In the year 1976 this program had been recreated by the most popular and talented artists of India instead of the previously created and absolutely heavenly one that was being played every year till then without any interruptions since 1929. There was a massive number of complaints about that program in 1976 and then Indian Radio had played again the previous one and till date that is the only one which is being played on the morning of 'Mahalaya'.
title: Mahalaya
plot: 'Mohishashur Mordini' is the most popular program on Indian Radio. In the year 1976 this program had been recreated by the most popular and talented artists of India instead of the previously created and absolutely heavenly one that was being played every year till then without any interruptions since 1929. There was a massive number of complaints about that program in 1976 and then Indian Radio had played again the previous one and till date that is the only one which is being played on the morning of '_Mahalaya_ (qv)'.
